minimum: At least 'S' grades for Information & Communication Technology (ICT), Science for Technology (SFT) and Engineering Technology (ET) or Biosystems Technology (BST).

minimum.rule: At least Ordinary Passes (S) in three subjects from the following subjects at the G.C.E. (Advanced Level) Examination
One or two subject/s from the above and the subject/subjects from the following subjects.
In addition to that, candidates should have satisfied the following requirements at the G.C.E. (Ordinary Level) Examination
subjects: (a) At least a Very Good Pass (B) in English
(b) At least a Credit Pass (C) in Mathematics
